Hello, Hackers

Welcome to MHacks!

We're excited to be here. Be sure to check out our coding challenge, bonus prizes, and job listings below. Dan and Jon will be at the booth through the night to answer questions and assist with all things tech.

- The Wellopp team


Coding Challenge

Build a Wellness App or Game

(Web, Native, or Hybrid)
Prize: Acer 10" Tablet


Examples
  • A motivational app that tracks your physical and/or emotional well-being
  • An app where a user can set a goal and it will generate tiny behaviors that lead to it
  • A game where you can physically attack cancer or similar disease
  • A top-level interface for hospital bedside tablets that can be used to navigate surveys, information, games, entertainment, etc.
Judging Criteria
  • Creativity
  • Relevance
  • Originality
  • Completeness
Bonus Points
  • Create a web browser game that can be played on a tablet by our patients in the hospital
  • Build something in React Native

Bonus Prizes

Social Panda: Introduce yourself! Say hi at our booth, then send us an email. Include your name, school, and tell us about 3 goals you have. Winner will be chosen randomly.

Meme Fox: Our team loves to communicate with memes and gifs. Give us some new memes, plz. Our team will vote on our favorite. You may submit between 1-5 memes.

Lone Deer: It takes courage to work alone. Show us that you are a strong, independent person that doesn't need a team to get the job done. Awarded to the best solo project.

Work Horse: Did one of your teammates go above and beyond? Did they stay up all night while everyone else took a nap? Send us an email telling us why they deserve this award.

Send all entries/nominations to dan@wellopp.com with the subject "MHacks Awards"

Prizes are the origami wall art kits pictured.


Join Us

Life At Wellopp

At Wellopp, wellness = opportunity. We are improving outcomes by engaging each patient and personalizing their most effective path to wellness. Our products cover everything from risk assessment to wellness rewards.

We are a rapidly growing healthcare technology startup with over 20 employees. We have offices in Toledo OH and Palo Alto CA, but also meet up around Ann Arbor MI. The dev team works remotely, but once a week, they carpool down to our main office in Toledo. On Wednesdays, the team usually meets in Ann Arbor at Zingermans, the world famous delicatessan. We like to mix up the schedule, and we occasionally meet at other coffee shops around the city.

At Wellopp, you'll have the opportunity to work in a small team, gain valuable startup experience, and write beautiful software. We are working on several new products, some of which haven't been written yet. Starting on your first day, you'll be thrown into the creative process and write production code. Your work will have an immediate impact on patients and caregivers.

Some Perks
  • Work remote 3-4 days per week
  • Flexible hours
  • Free meals
  • Retreats to scenic places such as Las Vegas, Leelanau Peninsula, Mammoth Lakes, etc.
  • Surprise activities such as yacht rides, private chefs, and wine tours
  • Professional development courses and opportunities to travel around the country
Most importantly...
  • Build software that improves and saves lives

Open Positions

Front-End Developer

Entry Level / Intern

Requirements
  • Minimum 3 years experience with HTML, JS, CSS
  • Digital portfolio of previous work that demonstrates elegant design, attention to detail, and proper implementation
  • Prior experience in Angular, React, or other client-side framework
  • Able to manipulate raster and vector graphics
  • Comfortable with git
Bonus
  • Experience with Jade (Pug), Sass, or other HTML/CSS preprocessors
  • Familiarity with Gulp
  • Experience in a backend framework such as Node
Full-Stack Developer

Entry Level / Intern

Requirements
  • Minimum 3 years experience with HTML, JS, CSS
  • Minimum 3 years experience with Node, Ruby, or other backend framework
  • Comfortable with linux, CLI, and configuring remote servers
  • Prior experience architecting SQL/NoSQL databases and REST APIs
  • Prior experience in Angular, React, or other client-side framework
  • Comfortable with git
Bonus
  • Experience building native or hybrid apps
Data Scientist

Entry Level / Intern

Requirements
  • Abilty to understand complex analytical solutions
  • Experience building logistic and linear regression models
  • Able to produce data vizualizations and summaries as requested by the business team
  • Experience with SQL, R, Python or similar languages
  • Experience working in Linux environment preferred
Bonus
  • Experience working with a cloud platform such as Cloudera or Databricks
  • Experience applying Machine Learning in real-world situations across multiple data sources

Send your resumes to dan@wellopp.com.

We want to get to know you, so include an introduction telling us about your interests, experience, and goals.
